doc.previous: Codenamed Looking Glass it is United States Strategic Command USSTRATCOM s Airborne Command Post designed to take over in case the Global Operations Center GOC located at Offutt Air Force Base Nebraska is destroyed or incapable of communicating with strategic forces The term looking glass is used because it mirrors the abilities of the US Navy to control nuclear forces
doc.after: Data from Navy Fact File 1  General characteristics
